data.name: Stubbs the Zombie in Rebel Without a Pulse - Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: No disc jockey’s collection is complete without the Stubbs the Zombie official soundtrack! Take any party from dullsville to far out with modern takes on the classics you know and love.
